text: Moses ga helekai gi Aaron mo ana dama daane, “Goodou kaina nia goneiga o di manu deenaa gi mua di bontai di Hale laa dela e noho ai Dimaadua, gaa dunu, gaa gai i di gowaa deelaa, ngaadahi mo nia palaawaa ala i lodo di gada ne hai tigidaumaha haga dabu tangada hai mee dabu, gii hai be nnelekai Dimaadua.
